item.title: Dhaka will be made a livable city if Jamaat comes to power: Dr Shafiqur
item.description: Bangladesh Jamaat-e- Islami Ameer Dr Shafiqur Rahman has said if his party is voted to power, it would turn Dhaka into a livable and safe city. He made the promise while carrying out electoral campaign as the party candidate for Dhaka -15 constituency in the upcoming 13th Jatiya Sangsad elections.
